home.hero_title: Manage your Self-Storage like a pro
home.hero_subtitle: The all-in-one platform to automate your operations, maximize occupancy and boost your revenue.
home.features_subtitle: A complete platform to manage every aspect of your self-storage business.
home.testimonials_subtitle: Join hundreds of operators who trust us.
home.pricing_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your growth. No hidden fees.
home.cta_subtitle: Join the operators who chose Boxibox to automate their business.

features.page_subtitle: Everything you need to manage your self-storage business, from booking to billing.
features.box_management_desc: Easily manage your storage units with our intuitive interface and interactive floor plans.
features.crm_desc: Track your leads, manage your customers and automate your marketing.
features.payments_desc: Recurring billing, SEPA direct debits and automatic reminders.
features.analytics_desc: Real-time dashboards, occupancy forecasts and price optimization.
features.access_control_desc: Smart lock integration, access codes and 24/7 monitoring.
features.mobile_app_desc: Mobile customer portal to manage bookings and payments.
features.integrations_subtitle: Connect Boxibox to your favorite tools
features.comparison_subtitle: Compare our features with the competition

pricing.page_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your growth. No hidden fees, no surprises.
pricing.enterprise_subtitle: For large enterprises with specific needs, we offer customized solutions.

contact.page_subtitle: Have a question? Our team is here to help. Response guaranteed within 24h.
contact.privacy_accept: I accept that my data will be processed in accordance with the
contact.success_message: Thank you for your message! We will respond within 24h.

demo.page_subtitle: Request a personalized demo and discover how Boxibox can transform your self-storage business.
demo.benefit_personalized_desc: 30 minutes with an expert to see the features adapted to your needs.
demo.benefit_no_commitment_desc: No credit card required. 14-day free trial included.
demo.benefit_migration_desc: Our team helps you import your existing data.
demo.form_subtitle: Fill out this form, we will contact you within 24h.
demo.privacy_text: By submitting this form, you accept our
demo.success_message: Demo request received! Our team will contact you within 24h.

calculator.page_subtitle: Discover how much you could save by switching to Boxibox.
calculator.occupancy_increase_desc: Thanks to online booking and CRM
calculator.how_we_calculate: How do we calculate your savings?
calculator.calculation_intro: Our estimates are based on real results from our customers.
calculator.automation_desc: On average, our customers save 40% of their administrative time through automation.
calculator.occupation_desc: Online booking and CRM increase occupancy rates by 5-15% on average.
calculator.dynamic_pricing_desc: Price optimization increases revenue per box by 8-12%.

about.page_subtitle: We build the tools that allow self-storage operators to focus on what really matters: their customers.
about.story_p1: Founded in 2023, Boxibox was born from a simple observation: existing self-storage management software was not adapted to the needs of modern operators.
about.story_p2: Our team, composed of technology experts and former self-storage professionals, decided to create the solution we would have wanted.
about.story_p3: Today, Boxibox supports hundreds of operators in France and Europe in their digital transformation.
about.values_subtitle: What guides each of our decisions.
about.value_simplicity_desc: We believe the best tools are the ones that fade away. Our software should be intuitive and never waste your time.
about.value_partnership_desc: Your success is our success. We don't just sell software, we build a long-term relationship of trust.
about.value_innovation_desc: We continuously invest in R&D to bring you the latest technologies: AI, IoT, automation.
about.cta_subtitle: Discover how we can transform your business.

footer.description: The modern SaaS solution to manage your self-storage business. Automate your operations and boost your revenue.
